answers.author: Derek Johnson
answers.text:
Matthew,
Attached is a copy of a golf course lease agreement between the City of Plano, Texas and Golfmark Investors. Plano owns the course and Golfmark runs it in a public/private enterprise. You will find many of your questions addressed and (hopefully) answered within this document. Good luck.
Derek Johnson

answers.author: Jennifer Chadwell
answers.text:
Matthew,  the City of Arlington, TX owns four municipal golf courses.  Hopefully you've gotten the answers to your question, but if not, please feel free to email me and I will have our gold manager provide you with the information you still require.

author: Matthew Chancey
text: What are some thoughts (positives/negatives) on a city buying a financially distressed golf course located within the city?
title: Cities owning a golf course
